page.title: 06FASHION IN THE 1980'S
page.content: The latest fashion today is jeans, baggy jumpers and bright socks. White jackets and pastel shades are coming into fashion. Colours like lemon, mint, white, pink and blue are popular. Fashions from the 1960's are also coming back into fashion. Mini skirts, stiletto heels, fishnet tights and fingerless gloves are favoured. Most people like to look smart and fashionable, but others prefer to look scruffy. We interviewed our teacher Mr. Walker about fashion. He said some of it was very creative, and that most people prefer to be casually dressed in comfortable clothes. We can only wonder what fashion will be like in ten or a hundred years time.
